Body:
Description: Hi Team,
Customer facing the internet connectivity issue when enabled the DPI setting.

I have disabled the DPI setting and checked the Internet connection, It was working smoothly. But when enabling the DPI, the users are facing the internet slowness issue.

Regards,
Prasanth

What We've Learned Updated: The issue is related to a VPN connection. (VPN app name pritunl)
When enabling the VPN and a CAP policy is assigned the issue is present.

Next Steps Updated: We enabled the Stealthy DPI option and the customer will confirm if the issue remains.

Next step is to enable all DPI bypass options to see if the issue remains.

Next, Updating the EPp client from 6.2.3.1 to 6.2.4.0 and collecting logs.
